parameters: A bizarre television was broadcasting a weather forecast:
The dates here are so strange
I think I was in my first year of college
The water fountain at home ran out of water,
I don't really like water when I have it, you know
If you get lost in fear,
flip the three switches on your predicament
Are you ready to face your future?
You've got enough courage. You want to arrive?
where do you want to go?
This antique shield belongs to my father
You use \C[6]the yellow key to open the box below the shield
I remember I broke it before
Later a month did not dare to go home,
If I had to do it all over again,
I'd rather be shot by dad,
If ONLY I could see dad now
I can never tell dad's whiskey apart
It's like dad doesn't know the brand of my clothes
Is there anything you can't throw away?
Is there anyone you can't leave?
You use \C[2]the red key to open the box
I remember when I had my first period,
I secretly signed a fake note and ran home
I called my mom, I didn't know anything,
I thought I was going to bleed to death
Mom came home for me on leave
This is a pot of chrysanthemum?
This is a pot of chrysanthemum?
False goodness is always better than truth
Home pizza never tastes as good as restaurant
But I like to see drunk people in movies
The red wine on the floor was unlabeled
There are also a lot of whiskey bottles
There are also a lot of whiskey bottles
In the middle of a pile of whiskey
There is a bottle of coke that I like
Red wine looks like blood and
You use \C[3]green key to open the draw
This is also a sample of some wines,
Mom always liked to give dad the wine list
Fill one jar and date it
Clutter is the stuff you don't normally remember
Those things that pile up in the corner of life
A bag of nuts. I love nuts,
and when I was a kid and we had no money,
One pistachio makes me happy for a day
Why do I feel like the hall is so big
It seemed like it would never end
All this stuff I used when I was a kid,
I thought they got rid of it
I've always felt that most of the good things
in the world don't belong to me
he used to sit here and talk to me Stories
Old stories are all about suffering,
In my opinion, the dinner table is the best
place for family members to communicate
I like to hide under the table when I play hide-and-seek
Eating together is a way to immerse yourself in
can make people lose their appetite.
In China, eating is a very important thing,
It's not just about eating, it's not just about ritual
So there are only two big chairs in the house
So there are only two big chairs in the house
The contents of the cask were still wine
What can a dark cask hold but wine
You can definitely reach me.... Be courageous
I could see in front of my eyes someone
I don't know where mom and dad are
